posting_body: ['1 Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit 2 Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Vistas at Plum Creek Apartments', '1129 S Eaton Cir, Castle Rock, CO, 80104', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 43', 'OR Text', '43', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to Vistas at Plum Creek Apartments', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 970 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At Vistas at Plum Creek, our community of Castle Rock apartments was designed specifically with our residents in mind, which is why we offer exclusive access to a resort-style sparkling swimming pool and lounge area, a vibrant, light-filled clubhouse with Wi-Fi and a gourmet-kitchen, and a 24-hour fitness center with an adjacent yoga studio to complement your active lifestyle.', 'Schedule your tour today!', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some age, weight and breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Driving Directions:', 'Take the Plum Creek exit from I-25 east 2 miles and we will be on the south side of the road on S. Eaton Circle.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'RnV8ddy3l6']
